title: Email
body: **What is Riot's email? I want to ask, Riot, something... **{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: You can email us at support@riotgames.com if you need to reach player support.  Otherwise, reach out to us via info@riotgames.com and we'll try to get you fielded to the proper team.  If you're having a game issue, I can certainly try to help here as well!
